name: phonebook-backend
description: Phonebook backend exercises for part 3 of full stack open 2022

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../full-stack-open-2022/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Ishaan Jamdar
